title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 10: Featuring Patrick O'Sullivan
description:
In this week's show, Patrick O'Sullivan joins the fellas to discuss his book "Breaking Away", which details the abusive upbringing he was subjected to from his father and how he's doing today. It's not an easy topic but an important one we wanted to discuss. The boys also talk about Jaromir Jagr's record-tying night, Marcus Foligno's hair flip for the ages, and the red-hot Minnesota Wild before tackling the weekly segments.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
